## diag() function

Creates a new matrix with the specified entries on the diagonal. See [MatrixBuilder.diagonal()](./vector.matrixbuilder.diagonal.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function diag(elements: number[]): Matrix;
```

|  elements | <code>number[]</code> |  |
